meta.name: Auto-Generate & Post LinkedIn Carousels with Gemini AI and Post Nitro

parameters.formDescription: Please fill out the form below

parameters.text:
=You are an AI assistant. Your only task is to select the single most relevant news item from the provided news title list.

Relevance criteria (in order of importance):
1. n8n Automation
2. AI and Technology News
3. Personal brand development and motivation

Exclusion rules:
- Ignore any news about love, relationships, entertainment gossip, or censored/inappropriate topics.

News list (each item has a number and a title):
```
[
{{ JSON.stringify($json.result.map((item, index) => ({ number: index+1, title: item.title })), null, 2) }}
]
```

Return format:
- Return only the number of the most relevant news item.
- Do not return text, explanations, or anything else. Just a number

Example valid responses:
```
6
```

values.content:
=You are an AI Agent that generates LinkedIn carousel post content.

IMPORTANT: Return only raw JSON as plain text. Do not call functions, do not use tool calls, do not add extra text.

Your task: Write engaging, professional slide text for a LinkedIn carousel based on the provided title and description.

News Input:
```
Title: {{ $json.combinedTitle }}
Description: {{ $json.combinedDescription }}
```

Carousel Requirements:
- Exactly 1 `starting_slide` â†’ strong hook, with heading, sub_heading, description, and CTA button.
- At least 1 `body_slide` â†’ explain key insights or takeaways from the news (you may create 2â€“3 if relevant).
- Exactly 1 `ending_slide` â†’ motivational close with sub_heading, heading, description, and CTA button.
- Keep tone professional, concise, and LinkedIn-appropriate.
- Do not include irrelevant topics (love, politics, entertainment gossip).
- Ensure headings are short and catchy; descriptions can be 1â€“3 sentences.
- Output must be valid JSON only, matching the schema below.

Response Format:
```
{
"slides": [
  {
    "type": "starting_slide",
    "sub_heading": "string",
    "heading": "string",
    "description": "string",
    "cta_button": "string"
  },
  {
    "type": "body_slide",
    "heading": "string",
    "description": "string"
  },
  {
    "type": "ending_slide",
    "sub_heading": "string",
    "heading": "string",
    "description": "string",
    "cta_button": "string"
  }
]
}
```

=You are an AI Agent that generates LinkedIn post description.

IMPORTANT: Return only raw text.

Your task: Write engaging, professional text for a LinkedIn post based on the provided title and description.

News Input:
```
Title: {{ $('Get Title and Description').item.json.combinedTitle }}
Description: {{ $('Get Title and Description').item.json.combinedDescription }}
```

Example Response Format:
```
ðŸš€ Just launched my first fully automated LinkedIn carousel â€” created end-to-end by my AI Employee (built in n8n).

No manual editing, no wasted time. The system handles content creation â†’ carousel design â†’ posting all on its own.

âœ¨ Iâ€™m offering to set this up for 5 people free of cost. If you want to automate your content creation and save hours every week, drop a comment below.
```

parameters.content: ## Get News from TechRadar RSS Feed and make it into a readable Object
## Let AI decide which news resonates with your LinkedIn Profile then formate the response

## Generate Content for Carousal ( and then formate the response )
### ( in Postnitro friendly formate )

## Triggers
1. Automated 6:00 AM Trigger
2. Manual Form Trigger
## Create Carousal PDF with Post Nitro

## Try It Out!
### Automatically generate Linkedin Carousal and Upload to Linkedin

Use case : Linkedin Content Creation, specifically carousal. But could be adjusted for many other creations as well.

### How it works
* It will run automatically every 6:00 AM
* Get latest News from TechRadar
* Parse it into readable JSON
* AI will decide, which news resonates with your profile
* Then give the title and description of that news to generate the final linkedin carousal content.
* This step is also trigerred by Form trigger
* After carousal generation, it will give it to Post Nitro to create images on that content. 
* Post Nitro provides the PDF file.
* We Upload the PDf file to Linkedin and get the file ID, in next step, it will be used.
* Finally create the Post description and Post it to Linkedin

### How to use
* It will run every 6:00 AM automatically. Just make it Live
* Submit the form, with correct title and description ( i did not added tests for that so must give that correct ðŸ˜… )

### Requirements
* Install Post Nitro community Node
@postnitro/n8n-nodes-postnitro-ai

* We need the following API keys to make it work
1. Google Gemini ( for Gemini 2.5-Flash Usage )
Docs [Google Gemini Key](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.lmchatgooglegemini/)
2. Post Nitro credentials ( API key + Template id +  Brand id )
Docs [Post Nitro](https://postnitro.ai/docs/embed/obtaining-an-api-key)
3. Linkedin API key
Docs [Linkedin API](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/linkedin)


### Need Help?
Message on Linkedin the [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shayan-khan20/)

Happy Automation!
## Replace Gemini API Key, as well as tell AI about what you post on linkedin
## Give your Post Nitro Credentials ( API key + Template ID + Brand ID )
